channel.title: Hugo on Coders Digest
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Coders Digest

item.title: Moving To Hugo
item.description: Create your own blog My blogging experience started with blogspot. It was great until I realized that I needed something that was responsive. The layout looked nice on 1024x768 but with the new generation of screens it started to look narrow. I hated the look of the website when it seemed that I was wasting a lot of white space on the web pages. I moved to wordpress.
